meaning_str.bing:
adv. 充分地；完全地；足足；全部地
网络. 彻底地；十分

充分地；完全地；足足；全部地

完全地；彻底地；充分地；详尽地；全部地；无保留地；最大程度地；毫无遗漏地；完整无缺地

1.en: She never managed to fully insinuate herself into such circles, as some believed her to be a spy for the Chancellor.
1.cn: 她从未真正融入这个圈子，因为有些人相信她是议长的间谍。

2.en: The land-based nuclear reactor became fully operational in 1970 and was ready to be fitted on the submarine.
2.cn: 陆基核反应炉在1970年实现完全运行并准备好在潜艇上安装。

3.en: With a virtual desktop, users no longer have to carry a fully loaded laptop device to be mobile.
3.cn: 通过使用虚拟桌面，用户就不再需要带着沉重的笔记本计算机到处跑了。

0.en: Though some dryers are much better than others, just make sure you dry them fully, and it shouldn't be a major problem.
0.cn: 虽然有些烘手机比较好，只要确保你完全地擦干手，应该就没什么大问题。

1.cn: 我当然知道她们是有生命的。

2.cn: 哈佛和拉德克利夫完全统一了。

3.en: Spock. You are fully capable of deciding your own destiny.
3.cn: 斯波克，你完全能够决定自己的命运。

4.en: Are you fully grown? No. I believe he's just a boy.
4.cn: 你长成熟了吗？还没。我想他只是个男孩。

5.en: And by the time they are fully trained, so will you be.
5.cn: 等它们训练有素之时，你们的训练也完成了。

6.en: Now the south has been subdued, and our forces are fully armed.

7.en: She will be 50 feet long when fully grown. Bigger than the T. Rex.
7.cn: 成熟后她将有50英尺长，比霸王龙体型还要大。

8.en: See there are still several areas that haven't been fully excavated.
8.cn: 因为里面还有些地区还没完全开挖的。

9.en: Once an idea has taken hold of the brain, it's almost impossible to eradicate. An idea that is fully formed, fully understood, that sticks. Right in there somewhere.
9.cn: 一旦扎根 根深蒂固盘亘脑海。

10.en: SpaceX is currently developing a fully and rapidly reusable launch system.
10.cn: SpaceX公司目前正在研发一种充分快速的可重复使用的运载系统。

11.en: Claire, why is there a fully cooked turkey in the backpack we left at your house?
11.cn: 克莱尔，我们落在你家的背包里怎么突然多了一只烤好的火鸡？

12.en: I see I'm not needed to lend you strength. You're fully in command of the argument.
12.cn: 看来我不需要助你一臂之力，你完全能控制得住局势。

13.en: Tiberius, this is going to sound completely horrible but, I do not fully trust you.
13.cn: 提比略，虽然这听上去很糟，但是，我不全信你。

14.en: When fully operational, it'll become the world's most powerful telescope of its class.
14.cn: 当其全面投运，将会是世界上同类望远镜中的翘楚。

15.en: No, Homo habilis was erect. Australopithecus was never fully erect. Well, maybe he was nervous.
15.cn: 不，能人是直立行走（与“勃起”同词）的，南方古猿不是完全直立行走的。或许他是紧张罢了。

16.en: Not many first-year students could take on a a fully grown mountain troll and live to tell the tale.
16.cn: 一年级新生能勇斗山中巨怪，还保住性命，这事可不多见。

17.en: OK, a fully equipped ambulance, Molly can examine me on the way, it'll save time. Ready to go, Molly?
17.cn: 好吧，有了装备齐全的救护车，茉莉可以在路上给我做检查，省点时间。准备好了吗，茉莉 ？

18.en: I now need you to acknowledge receipt of the package so that I'm fully indemnified and no longer liable.
18.cn: 我现在要你确认收到包裹我才算完整履行法律义务。

19.en: Damn! They got big. Yeah, they fully mature on the flight out. So the proprioceptive sims seem to work really well.
19.cn: 靠，他们真是巨大。是啊，他们已经完全成熟了，看来模拟化身运作良好。
